Articles.Content:
So... I was thinking of getting Rise Of Flight... but I'm not sure yet... the community seems a bit weak... but, is there anyone else here that owns it and can tell me what it's like?

Also, I'm not sure which one to get, there's the one on Steam, and there's like the Iron Cross one... so yeah.

Thanks.

There's a free version of Rise of Flight which only comes with two planes. But it's well worth trying out. Then if you like it, you can pay for additional planes, which seems fair to me.

I've played it a bit, and it's a damned good simulator, but I happen to like WWI style flight sims. My friend Lotus, on the other hand, won't touch anything that lacks an afterburner. (smile)
@Pebble: Lotus... I think I found Jeb's undercover name!

Yeah, I noticed the free version... if I do buy it though. Which "edition" should I get? I was thinking the one on Steam.

As for the different eras of flight. I've always loved aviation... at first I was into commercial aviation, then general, then military, then WW2, now I feel like I'm transitioning into WW1...
Steam might be good for the holiday sale.
